timeline.bodyText: I think, that bbmri-test namespace is no longer required and module can be removed. I'll ask and let you know.
timeline.author: zlamalp

replies.bodyText: I have it confirmed, module for bbmri-test can be removed from the code.
replies.author: zlamalp

timeline.message:
Refactorization of persistent shadow modules

* Persistent shadow modules contained duplicit code that could be
easily extracted and resued.
* This makes it easy to create new persistent shadow modules. Also, this
ensures that all of them works exactly the same way.
* Created abstract classes for modules that encapsulates common
behaviour.
